notes.title: Matt's First Thought
notes.body: the capacity to trust shouldn't be affected by the inability of others to honor that trust

notes.title: Audrey's Thought
notes.body: I wish vegan cheese wasn't an extra dollar

notes.title: Matt's Second Thought
notes.body: There can be no truly tolerant society without intolerance.

notes.title: Kira's Thought
notes.body: I really wish I weren't allergic to dogs.
